Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2445 TECHNOLOGY FOREST BOULEVARD,LEVEL 6, THE WOODLANDS, Texas, 77381, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Excelerate Energy, Inc. provides flexible liquefied natural gas (LNG) solutions worldwide. The company offers regasification services, including floating storage and regasification units (FSRUs), infrastructure development, and LNG and natural gas supply, procurement, and distribution services; LNG terminal services; natural gas supply to-power projects; and a suite of smaller-scale gas distribution solutions. It also leases an LNG terminal in Bahia, Brazil. Excelerate Energy, Inc. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in The Woodlands, Texas. Excelerate Energy, Inc.

value.name: David Liner
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
